title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.RotationAngle
description: Gets or sets the angle of rotation of instances in this linear component pattern.
returns: Angle of rotation in radians of pattern instances
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData::RotateInstances
is true.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
For more information, see the
Linear Component Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
